overview:
The Founder of TicWatches.co.uk which is part of the TicTrading Limited group.

Daniel Richmond is a very well presented and confident individual with a vast amount of experience and knowledge within the fashion watch sector. He is a very hard working individual who excels under pressure in order to meet strict deadlines and targets using my own initiative but also as a team member.

He possess immense communication skills and puts himself under intense pressure to make sure he hits the high standards he expects of both himself and others around him.
